/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/DCMotor.dir/DCMotor.cpp.o  -o DCMotor -rdynamic /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_vc_client.so /opt/vc/lib/libvcos.so /opt/vc/lib/libbcm_host.so -lwiringPi -lpthread -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_video -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_ml -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_flann -lopencv_core -Wl,-rpath,/opt/vc/lib
